COMBAT_SPECIALIZATION.name: combat specialization
COMBAT_SPECIALIZATION.text: At 2nd level, you may choose a combat specialization, which represents the style of combat you favor. You gain abilities at 2nd, 6th, 10th, and 14th levels.

MASTER_OF_COMBAT.name: master of combat
MASTER_OF_COMBAT.text: At 20th level, you have become an expert at so many types of combat that it is almost instinctive. You gain an additional martial focus, which is gained and spent independently from your first. This stacks with the Great Focus feat, if you have it.
